name: Twisted Wires
description:
Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 (Theme: Holes)

How to Play:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Use
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Shift - Extend view
  • Q - Toggle Flashlight

I used the standard FPS controller and some CC0 sound effects from OpenGameArt.org. Everything else is created by myself using Blender, Unity and FL Studio. 

I wanted to focus on atmosphere with this game and I have a weird attraction to utility tunnels. I recommend downloading the game for better quality.

If you can't figure it out or get stuck, I created this walkthrough:

SPOILERS:

  1. Pick a rock from the table and throw it at the glass next to it. Pull the lever behind the glass to open a pathway to a secret room with a hint for the number puzzle.
  2. The correct numbers for the floor cover are determined by adding the two numbers by their side. For example 1 + 4 = 5, 4 + 3 = 7, 3 + 1 = 4 and so on...
  3. As for the computer password, there's a riddle written on a wall under the floor grill. The answer is a 10 letter word.
